people: Mrs. B. L. T. Bourland & Sons
fullText:
Mrs Stanton & self
spent day together
Lorin Grant Pratt
Geo. V. Kent Local Transcrpt
Mrs. B. L. T. Bourland & Sons --
summaryText: Susan B. Anthony spent the day with Mrs. Stanton, Lorin Grant Pratt, Geo. V. Kent Local Transcrpt, and Mrs. B. L. T. Bourland & Sons at Peoria House in Peoria.
